item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18700)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @BLM5280 was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=BLM5280&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúThis work is a full-time job,‚Äù Brown said. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt make headlines and it‚Äôs not glamorous. But it‚Äôs the stuff that will build community long term. Places to find employment, places to find resources, places to feel safe.‚Äù

https://www.msmayhem.com/how-blm-5280-became-more-than-has‚Ä¶/

With the help of co-founder Amy E. Brown, Black Lives Matter 5280 is far more than just a hashtag. They're building long-term community.

Get into this all-day virtual healing space!
#BlackHealingIsRevolutionary

Black Lives Matter Louisville is in Louisville, Kentucky.

TA-DAY!!! ALL DAY TODAY IS A DOCUS ON HEALING!

We've gathered practitioners and therapists of all backgrounds to discuss how Black women and femmes questions f...or healing is a must.

Learn to practice healing techniques.

Watch on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter.

Donate here: bit.ly/BlackFemmeHealingFund

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denzel CaldwellEven though the use of sexual violence on Black men during chattel slavery is a MUCH needed topic that...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denzel Caldwell

Even though the use of sexual violence on Black men during chattel slavery is a MUCH needed topic that needs to be addressed, I'm definitely NOT recommending th...at Buck Breaking doc that Tariq Nasheed is making.

All it will be is:

1. A cluster of misinformation, a few historical truths, and sensational media.

2. A propaganda film that will ultimately lead our folks to double down on their homophobia instead of unpacking historic and present sexual violence on Black Men and reimagining how we address sexual violence.

3. Another reason to traumatize viewers

Instead, if folks are serious in learning about the ways we were dehumanized in hopes of creating new ways of being and healing, i would recommend "Delectable Negro by Vincent Woodard.

P.S. Even if this book is referenced in the doc, it doesn't matter. Going to the sources will always be better than looking at what those who want to profit from you want to see.

Shout out to Preston Anderson for putting me on to this text!

EDIT: S/o to Anwar Jabari Johnson and Kenneth M Pass for recommending "Rethinking Rufus: The Sexual Violation of Enslaved Men" by Thomas A Foster

Have a great day!

#ReadMyPeople

See More

üó£HEAR FROM EXPERTS ABOUT DISRUPTING THE SCHOOL-TO-PRISON PIPELINE

Register here: https://p2a.co/MxVyND8

Join us at Padres & JoÃÅvenes Unidos in partnership with... Stand for Children Colorado on Wednesday, March 10 at 4:30 pm to hear from a panel of experts about the school to prison pipeline‚Äîboth the problem and potential solutions.

We are leading efforts at the Capitol to advance solutions to disrupt and end the school-to-prison pipeline. We will share information about how to get involved in supporting those efforts, reserve plenty of time for questions, and spend time reflecting on what we've heard. This event will be fully bilingual in Spanish and English.

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and GirlsLet us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and Girls

Let us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal footsteps of Harriet Tubman.

In March 2018, we rallied a group of Trekkers to go on a ...walking journey that started in the Eastern Shore of Maryland, where Harriet Tubman made her first escape, and went along the path she took to freedom along the Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Byway.

It was Harriet‚Äôs Great Escape. We trekked in sun, sleet and cold weather to exemplify radical courage and unshakeable sisterhood.

Harriet Tubman saved her own life first and then went back time after time to save the lives of others giving us the blueprint for the work GirlTrek does today.

This is radical self-care at its core.

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations

Hess Love

Today is Harriet Tubman Day, it's the anniversary of her transition into Ancestorhood. She is one of the most formidable, collectively elevated Ancestors known ...in our tradition. A visionary. Literally a visionary in the political, spiritual, and social sense. Harriet Tubman thought about the collective AND she thought about herself, remember, ùò¥ùò©ùò¶ was the FIRST person that she took up north.

A spiritual thing that you can do in her honor is to send money to Black mutual aid orgs. Sharing money is sharing energy. ‚ú®

Please list some orgs in the comments.

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Ari RaeDenver and Front Range area! We are expected to get up to 2.5 ft of snow this week and our unhoused neighbors...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Ari Rae

Denver and Front Range area! We are expected to get up to 2.5 ft of snow this week and our unhoused neighbors needs supplies. Tents, tarps, sleeping bags, emerg...ency blankets, warm underlayers, Hand warmers, toe warmers, warm socks and more!

Here are some places accepting supplies:

Mutiny Information Cafe and Amethyst Coffee- Broadway

If you have GOOD WARM GEAR I can pick up this week before the storm as well!

Also, you can venmo me
@Ari_1312 as I will be doing a supply drop before the storm.
The Venmo listed on Comrade Collective's infographic below is also taking donations!

The last storm took the lives of 4 people and many left with frost bite.

Good tips for every day is to keep kits in your car with handwarmers, water, snacks and warm socks and pass out when you drive past folks.

If you need resources on mutual aid groups to donate to in Boulder/Northern Colorado feel free to DM me

See More

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùóÔ∏èAll my homies hate Mayor Hancock‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùóÔ∏è‚ùóÔ∏è
Please show up and support with whatever is needed!
With the storm coming this weekend people are going to need more survival gear to replace what is being stolen from them and destroyed!
Tarps, tents, and hand warmers are always needed.
You can get tarps for only $6-$7 at most big box stores.

item.title: It hurts how relevant this still is. Unfriendly Reminder:
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280 shared a memory.

It hurts how relevant this still is.
Unfriendly Reminder:

5 Years AgoSee Your Memorieschevron-rightBlack Lives Matter 5280

To those who are on here saying, "Black Lives Matter!", AND, "Yesterday's 'homeless sweep' was a good thing!":
Please pick one of those sentences and stop saying it immediately.
That is all.
#MoveAlongToWhere

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
